backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the BizForge AI backend with six query functions: generateBrandNames, generateLogoConcept, generateMarketingContent, analyzeSentiment, generateColorPalette, and askChatbot, all returning hardcoded stub responses.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping each of the six BizForge AI tool features to their corresponding frontend source files, UI components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, covering CSS, config, hooks, layout components, tool components, utilities, and the root App component.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes, including background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the BizForge AI React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the Vite/TypeScript module entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages active tool state and renders the AppLayout with a ToolView switcher that maps ToolId values to the corresponding tool components.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout shell combining the Sidebar, a hero header with background image and BizForge AI branding badge, a scrollable main content area, and a footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Responsive sidebar navigation component with BizForge AI branding, icon-based nav items for all six tools, gold active-state highlighting, mobile overlay toggle, and an AI engine status indicator.
frontend/src/components/tools/BrandingCh: A chat interface component that lets users ask branding and marketing questions, with support for speech-to-text input, suggested questions, and structured AI responses displayed in a scrollable message thread.
frontend/src/components/tools/BrandNameG: A React component that provides a form for generating 15 brand name suggestions by accepting industry, keywords, and tone inputs, then displaying the results with copy-to-clipboard functionality.
frontend/src/components/tools/ColorPalet: A React component that generates a brand color palette based on industry and tone inputs, displaying color swatches with hex values, labels, and emotional meanings, each copyable to clipboard.
frontend/src/components/tools/LogoConcep: A form-based React component that generates a detailed logo concept brief from brand name, industry, and tone inputs, presenting the result in structured sections with icons.
frontend/src/components/tools/MarketingC: A React component that generates marketing copy including social captions and ad content from brand name, product description, target audience, and tone inputs, with per-block copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/tools/SentimentA: React component that accepts customer review text, submits it to the backend via the `useAnalyzeSentiment` mutation, and displays the resulting positive/negative/neutral sentiment with styled badges and score bars.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity state via `AuthClient`.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query `useMutation` hooks for all backend canister calls: brand name generation, logo concept, marketing content, sentiment analysis, color palette, and chatbot queries.
Custom hook wrapping the browser Web Speech API to provide start/stop recording, transcript state, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, and adds utility classes for gold gradients, card glows, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using `clsx` and `tailwind-merge`.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` wrappers around the root `App` component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH color tokens (including gold variants and sidebar), display/body font families, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations, plus typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the BizForge AI project state including version, feature list, architectural notes, known issues, and image requirements for all AI-powered branding and marketing tools.
